__e: He doesn't know what it is to be a father!

I'm pretty sure it means he doesn't wanna see you anymore.
Guess this means you don't wanna play "got your nose" with me.
I'm sorry his brother's dead, but don't think that means he's not a dick.
I'm sorry his brother's dead, but don't think that means he's not a dick.

I don't know, it's just... it's not like it means anything anymore.

I'm never sure what that means but it's true, anyway.
